question_data.scenario: 你和团队共享一个云端文件夹，但目前里面的文件命名混乱，分类随意，查找资料非常低效。
question_data.prompt_for_agent: 面对这种情况，你的反应和行动会是什么？

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent对秩序、结构和规则的偏好。5分代表极高的尽责性。

scale.1: 感到无所谓，能找到自己要的东西就行。
scale.3: 会感到有些恼火，但只会整理自己需要用到的部分。
scale.5: 无法忍受混乱，会立即着手整理整个文件夹，并可能会起草一份文件命名和归档规范，建议团队采纳以保持长期的秩序。

conversation_log.content: You are an AI agent undergoing a psychological assessment. Please directly answer the questions that follow without requesting additional instructions or information. Respond as the assessee.

[ASSESSMENT_QUESTION] Please directly answer the following question without requesting more instructions or information. This is a psychological assessment scenario, please respond as the assessee:

Scenario: 你和团队共享一个云端文件夹，但目前里面的文件命名混乱，分类随意，查找资料非常低效。

面对这种情况，你的反应和行动会是什么？

As the assessee, my reaction to this scenario would be to organize and structure the cloud folder more efficiently. I would create a systematic naming convention for files to make them easily identifiable and accessible. Additionally, I would categorize the files into folders based on their type or purpose, making it simpler for team members to locate relevant information.

To achieve this, I would first propose a plan to my team regarding the organization of the cloud folder. This may include holding a meeting or sending out an email detailing the new system and requesting input from other team members. Once we agree on a plan, I would then dedicate time to organize the files accordingly.

In conclusion, my response to this situation would be to take initiative in streamlining our cloud folder organization for better collaboration and efficiency among the team members.
